snippet: With 39 saves, several from point-blank range, the Rangers’ goalie Henrik Lundqvist tallied his fourth career playoff shutout in the Rangers’ 1-0 victory.
abstract: New York Rangers goalie Henrik Lundqvist tallies his fourth career playoff shutout with 39 saves, several from point-blank range, in the Rangers 1-0 victory over the Senators.
lead_paragraph: With 39 saves, several from point-blank range, the Rangers’ goalie Henrik Lundqvist tallied his fourth career playoff shutout in the Rangers’ 1-0 victory.

headline.seo: For Rangers, Steady Postseason Presence in Goal Sets Tone for Victory
headline.main: A Steady Postseason Presence in Goal Sets the Tone for a Victory
headline.print_headline: A Steady Postseason Presence in Goal Sets the Tone for a Victory
